name: Custom Melbourne Melways Street Directory Resin Pendant w/ Silver Chain
description:
Here's your chance to have your very own custom made 1" Melways Resin Pendant!

All you need to do is tell me what suburb, street OR Mel Ref you're after and I will make it for you.

Please keep in mind that 1" is quite small so you may not be able to have your street and suburb on the same pendant.

Hard wearing and waterproof! Although I wouldn't recommend wearing it in the shower or whilst swimming.

Pendant: 25mm x 25mm x 5mm, not including bail

Ball Chain Necklace: 610mm (24”) long - can be made shorter by you or me.

Gift wrapped in red tissue paper and placed in a little box for you.

One of a kind! Truly original gift idea!

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for looking!

LOOPI... for you

xo

name: 10 x Custom Melbourne Melways Street Directory Magnets
description:
: : BULK SAVINGS! : :

10 Custom Magnets!!

All you need to do is tell me which suburbs, streets OR Mel Ref's you're after and I will press the magnets for you.

Please keep in mind that 1" is quite small so you may not be able to have your street and suburb on the same magnet.

Size: 1" across (25mm)
Qty: 10

What a great souvenir!

I use quality Tecre components for all badges & magnets

Also available as snap hair clips, hair slides, adjustable rings or pin back badges!!

I can individually package or pack them all together... just let me know (packed together unless you tell me)

Please let me know if you have any questions.

My blog: http://www.loopiforyou.com

Thanks for looking!

LOOPI… for you

xo
